songs.scene_description: First song as the Mother Gothel sings to the golden flower. Gothel steals Rapunzel as a child.
Rapunzel sings in the morning as she cleans her tower with Pascal her chameleon.
Rapunzel's mother sings her this song after Rapunzel asks to leave her tower to see the stars.
Flynn is chased through the forrest as they try to retrieve his satchel.
Rapunzel looks out of her tower after Flynn promises her to take her to the lights. She jumps out and falls down her hair onto grass for the first time.
The thugs sing this song in the pub after they try to abduct Flynn. Rapunzel saves him and asks them if they've ever had a dream.
Flynn/Eugene and Rapunzel escape from the prison guards and the horse.
Rapunzel heals Flynn's hand around the camp fire.
Rapunzel tells Flynn about her life and her mother as they sit around the camp fire.
Mother finds Rapunzel and she tries to take her back to the tower. Rapunzel refuses and goes back to Flynn.
Mother Gossel schemes as she tries to get Rapunzel back.
Rapunzel arrives in the kingdom and see's pictures of her as the 'lost princess'. She starts dancing with all the people.
Flynn and Rapunzel sit and wait for the lantern light to appear in the sky.
Rapunzel sings this song as she watches the lanterns rise up into the sky. Flynn starts singing with her.
Rapunzel realizes that her mother stole her as child. Continues as Flynn escapes from the prison with help from the thugs.
Rapunzel sheds a tear onto Flynn and heals him.
End of the movie as Flynn/Eugene narrates and the Kingdom celebrates.
First song during the end credits.
When Gothel dosen't find Tangled

songs.scene_description: Plays briefly in the fim\'s opening.
Riley is walking in the rain when he gets attacked. He tries to escape but is bitten

Charlie ungrounds Bella on the condition she visits. Jacob and Edward show up in the truck when she tries to leave.

song.name: How Can You Swallow So Much Sleep

songs.scene_description: The Cullens chase Victoria in the night forest
Jacob confronts Edward at school about the vampires entering the wolves territory.
Bella gets on the back of Jacobs motorbike and they drive off as Edward  watches.
Jacob tells Bella about imprinting
Edward feels someone's been in Bella's room. The Cullens decide how to act further
Bella and Edward are driving up to the treaty line to meet Jacob
Edward drives away after dropping Bella off with Jacob.
Bella and Edward are lying in bed together talking about what to tell people if Bella chooses to be a vampire. They kiss.
Jacob declares his love for Bella and kisses her. She punches him but brakes her hand
Rosalie tells Bella her unhappy story
Riley warns the newborns about controlling themselves. The Volturi watch them
First song playing at the party.
Second song playing at the party. Bella sees Jacob and he apologizes for kissing her.
Alice sees the newborns passing around Bella's red blouse and understands that they're about to come to Forks. The Cullens and werewolves decide to fight and train together despite Bella's protests
The vampires and werewolfs are training to fight the newborns.
Jasper reminisces about meeting Maria and further training newborns on her command
An experiment about suppressing Bella's scent with Jacob's by him carrying her
Bella and Edward kiss on the bed but Edward denies her sex. Continues after Bella says yes to his marriage proposal.
Victoria and Riley talk about ending the Cullen clan and kiss.

song.name: Rolling In on a Burning Tire

songs.scene_description: Jacob carries Bella to the camping place. The newborns set off for Forks
Jacob learns Bella\'s marrying Edward. She tries to persuade Jake to stay and begs him to kiss her

Bella visits Jacob on his sickbed
The final scene. Bella clarifies herself about her feelings and her desire to join Edward's world

Second end credits song.
Third end credits song.

First song as movie opens with Tina dances to Swan Lake. She awakes and realizes it was a dream.
Nina tells her mom about her dream.
Nina takes the train to the studio for the new season of ballet.
Nina goes into Beth's room after she storms out and steals her lipstick.
Nina is elected the new swan queen on the board. She calls her mom excitedly in the bathroom to tell her.
Nina masturbates in her bed after Thomas tells her to touch herself as homework.
Nina goes to visit Beth in hospital after she gets hit by a car.
Nina dances with Thomas as he tries to teach her the black swan. He starts to touch her all over her body and forces her to kiss him.
Nina confronts Lily after she dobs on her for whining to Thomas.
Lily & Nina begin their evening at the nightclub
During the club scene when Lily and Nina take drugs and dance drunkily with boys, three Chemical Brothers songs appear, however the order is unknown.
During the club scene when Lily and Nina take drugs and dance drunkily with boys. The chemical brothers produced three original songs for this scene however the order is unknown.
During the club scene when Lily and Nina take drugs and dance drunkily with boys. The chemical brothers produced three original songs for this scene however the order is unknown.
Nina in the club bathroom
Nina watches Lily lace her drink with ecstasy
Lily & Nina share a booth with the boys at the club
Nina makes out with a random stranger in the club bathroom
Lily tries to touch Nina in the cab. Song continues as they make out in her room and Lily goes down on Nina.

Nina finds Lily and Thomas having sex after someone turns the lights out. She runs out of the studio. Continues for the night as she watches Beth stab herself in face. Intensifies as she pulls thorns out of her skin as she transforms into the black swan.
Nina notices her feet are starting to web together before her performance. Continues as the first song of Swan Lake as Nina dances and is dropped.
Nina stabs and kills Lily in the dressing room in between performances. She hides her body in the closet.
Song as Nina comes out to dance the Black Swan part of swan lake after killing Lily.
After Nina realizes she stabbed herself. She goes on to dance her final part as the white swan. She jumps into the bed and says it was perfect.
Played throughout the end credits.

songs.scene_description: First song as opening credits appear and Kevin Flynn narrates.
After Flynn disappears. Sam watches the television. Plays throughout film at various times.
Flynn's son, Sam, rides his Ducati motorbike through the streets, weaving in and out of traffic as the police chase him. He breaks into the Encom building.
Sam is inside the Encom building, He disables a security camera
Sam escapes onto the roof of the building where he speaks to the security guard, then parachutes off the top.
First song when Sam turns on all the video game machines at the Flynn's game arcade.
Second song at the Flynn's arcade after Sam finds the secret passageway behind the TRON game.
Sam breaks into the digital world and onto the grid of TRON. He is immediately captured and taken to the armory.
Sam is taken to the armory after being captured. He is suited up and prepared for battle by four surreal woman.
Sam is forced to battle other Programs in the Arena.
Sam battles a program in the disc wars in round one.
Sam fights Rinzler, Clu's right hand man, in the Arena final.
Sam battles Clu and his team in the racing arena. Music intensifies as Sam and his team start to use the levels.
Quorra saves Sam from the racing game right before Clu is about to kill him. She takes him him out of the grid and through the outlands to his father, Kevin.
Sam, Kevin and Quorra are in the apartment of Kevin Flynn, having dinner and talking about how to get back to the real world.
Kevin notices Sam has left and walks outside, cuts to Sam on the vintage light cycle.
Sam takes the vintage light bike of his father to the city, trying to find the sector given by Quorra. On the way Sam finds one of the sirens from the armory, Gem, she takes Sam to the club.
Song in Zuse's club when he first walks in with Meg. He meets Zuse and asks him up to his private office.
Just before Derezzed and the fight scene, while the enemies glide into the club.

When Clu and the black guard search Flynn's stronghold and Clu has the flashback to his creation after seeing his reflection in the "apple".

Found on Tron Legacy - Special Edition CD - Reflections (5)
During the fight scene at Zuse's club. Sam jumps out of Zeus's office and fights Clu's men. The two DJ's look at each other, nod and start playing this song.
Kevin Flynn appears in the club and rises from the floor as this music starts. Zuse steals Kevin's disc.
After the elevator incident, Sam, his father and Quorra get on this kind of subway, in this case "the Solar Sailer" and Wichita takes them to the portal.
Sam, Quoyra, and Flynn escape on the Solar Sail and reboot Quorra after removing the damaged code.
Sam and Kevin watch as the army marches and CLU gives a speech.
Sam gets into Clu's ship to get Kevin's identity disc, battling the security guard. Meanwhile Kevin obtains access to the plane fighter.
During the flight battle as CLU chases Kevin and Sam in the plane.
They arrive at the portal to find CLU blocking their way out. Kevin tries to reason with CLU and apologizes.
Sam and Querra escape from the portal. Alan is waiting for him at the arcade when he arrives home.
Sam rides with Quorra on his motorcycle, showing her the sunrise she has longed to see.
Sam shows Querra the sunrise before the end credits starts.
First song during the end credits.
Sam and his father, Kevin Flynn, are re-united once again.

albums.name: TRON: Legacy - The Complete Edition (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)

songs.scene_description: First song during opening credits. Raining in the city as people walk with umbrellas.
Four years later, the snipers are attacked in the umbrella corporation.
The umbrella corporation attempts to secure the main entrance as Alice attacks them from behind.
Alice and her twin are getting shot at before they jump out the window together.
6 months later. Song as Alice is flying over Glaciers and icebergs in Alaska.
Alice and Claire fly over the Hollywood sign and find Los Angeles in ruins.
The show Alice that Arcadia is not a town, but a ship. She looks through the binoculars.
Song as Claire and Alice fight the giant axe zombie.
They take a small boat across the water to Arcadia.
Last song as the planes approach Arcadia. Plays into end credits.

songs.scene_description: Opening credits.
Opening music as Daniels and Aule meet on the boat.

Music as Daniels and Aule arrive on shutter island. The officers seem on edge as they drive up to the hospital. (0:44) In a flashback, Daniels and his men line up and shoot a bunch of German soldiers at the concentration camp. (1:01) Daniels holds the body of his daughter Rachel. He places her body in the pond with the other bodies. (1:42) The car explodes. Daniels swims to the lighthouse. (2:20) Final scene, plays into the end credits.

artist.name: Antonio Wit & National Polish Radio Symphony

songs.scene_description: Daniels and Aule are being examined by security before arriving at Dr. Crawford's office. [0:13] Daniels and Aule investigates Rachel's room
Daniels remembers the bodies at Dachau. [0:59] Teddy meets Laeddis.
Daniels and Aule find the orderlies playing cards. [0:19] Daniels and Aule follow Dr. Cawley to his office.

song.name: Quattro Pezzi (su una Nota Sola): I. -

artist.name: Johannes Kalitzke, Peter Rundel & Vienna Radio Symphony Orchestra

songs.scene_description: Daniels and Aule and the guards are looking for Solando at the bay. [0:19] Daniels and Aule are being driven to their rooms. Daniels talks about the case with Aule.
Aule is interrogating the doctors about Solando. (0:38) Daniels talks with Aule about Noyce. (1:05) Daniels and Aule walk to Ward C. (1:21) Daniels climbs down the rocks.
Dr. Cawley has Daniels and Aule over for drinks and cigars.

song.name: Quartet for Strings and Piano In a Minor

songs.scene_description: Playing on the record player as Daniels dreams back to his wife confronting him about finding alcohol. [0:48] Daniels and Aule exit the shower.
Music in the background during the dream as Daniels' wife turns to ash. (1:15) Noyce tells Daniels that Laeddis has been transferred to another cell.
Daniels shows Aule the note in the rain. (1:22) Daniels looks for Aule by the shore.

song.name: Uaxuctum - The Legend of the Mayan City which they themselves destroyed for religious reasons: I. -

artist.name: Johannes Kalitzke, Peter Rundel & Vienna Radio Symphony Orchestra

songs.scene_description: Teddy and Chuck goes inside the chapel.
Daniels tells Aule that he’s going to expose this place. Aule tells him it’s not that easy.
Chuck tells Teddy that Solando may not have existed and that they have been set up.

song.name: Four Hymns: II. For Cello and Double Bass

songs.scene_description: Daniels and Aule exit the shower. [1:09] Daniels wandering the corridors of Ward C.
Dr. Crawford Takes Daniels and Aule to his office and talk about how they found Rachael. Daniels then suffers seizures from the lighting.
Teddy is taken to the infirmary after suffering a seizure.

artist.name: Edo de Waart & San Francisco Symphony

songs.scene_description: Daniels has another vision where he is walking pass the bodies at Dachau, a little girl asks him why he did not save her. [2:02] Daniels shoots Dolores.
In a dream sequence, Daniels talks to Laeddis.

song.name: QUARTET FOR PIANO AND STRINGS IN A MINOR

songs.scene_description: Dolores tells Daniels that Laeddis isn't dead and that he is on the island.

song.name: My Father Knew Charles Ives, II. The Lake

Daniels climbs up from the bay and gets a ride from a guard to the asylum.
Daniels takes a shower.

songs.scene_description: Opening titles. Hiccup introduces his island of Berk and tells about Vikings' confrontation with dragons
The tribe is fighting dragons while Hiccup sneaks out of the smithy with his bolas cannon
Hiccup finds a Night Fury that he managed to down, but instead of killing he lets it go
Gobber trains the village youths in dragon fighting
Hiccup notices that the Night Fury can't fly properly because of the missing part of the tail
Hiccup reads the Dragon Book where all known to the tribe dragon species are listed
During the training session the youths try to find dragons' blind spots
Hiccup befriends the dragon that he names Toothless and it finally lets Hiccup stroke him
Hiccup makes the missing part of the tail for Toothless
Hiccup makes himself a saddle and modifies a tail so that he can control it. He learns a lot about dragons and it helps him during trainings. He becomes popular
Toothless and Hiccup's first really successful flight
Hiccup realizes that everything that the Vikings know about dragons is wrong
Hiccup wins the last round of the training without really intending to. Astrid is mad
Toothless gives Astrid a hard ride until she gets so terrified that apologizes to Hiccup
Toothless calms down at the same instant and gives them a really pleasant flight that completely charms Astrid
After hearing that Hiccup is supposed to kill a dragon the next day Toothless takes them to their nest
Hiccup persuades Astrid to keep silence about the dragons' nest until he comes up with something

During Hiccup's graduation, he throws down his weapons and tries to show everyone that dragons are not as bad as they seem. Stoick stops the battle and the dragon attacks Hiccup. Toothless rushes to save him and is pinned by the Vikings
The Vikings set sail to the dragons' nest with the imprisoned Toothless as a guide, leaving Hiccup with Astrid
The giant dragon attacks, setting all the boats on fire
The youngsters appear at the battlefield, riding the dragons
Stoick searches the rubble for his son, and finds Toothless has saved Hiccup by wrapping him in his wings
Hiccup is welcomed back as a hero

Camera flies out over the lake. The five guys are rowing out to the island to release the ashes.

artist.name: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band

songs.scene_description: They reach the island to throw the ashes. They sit around with a KFC bucket before Rob releases them.
They get back after throwing the ashes. Eric (Kevin James) is dancing up the hill to this song. Rob's hot daughter shows up and the others stare at her as she opens the bonnet.
When they play arrow roulette and run around trying to dodge the arrow.
Roxanne is about to leave the lake house but sees her kids playing and skimming rocks in the lake. She tries to skim one but hits her son.
They go to the waterpark.
They ladies are lying by the pool and notice the hot guy across the pool flexing his pecs.
Sally takes her shirt off and dances around in her bikini to intrigue the hot guy across the pool.

song.name: Come and Get Your Love - Re-Record

songs.scene_description: They're sneaking in the side with the kids to jump the queue at the waterslide. The hot guy approaches the ladies.
Slow motion of everyone sliding into the water. Rob pushes the slide attendant down the slide. All the guys pee in the pool.
After the waterpark, they're shooting hoops.
Marcus (David Spade) is drinking around the fire while trying to get everyone to do shots with him.
Marcus (Spade) says he loves this song and Gloria says it makes her horny. All the couples get up and dance to it.
The girls are sewing and cooking in the morning when Marcus comes out of the closet.
The guys are playing chutes and ladder. Rob tells them he's thinking of having a baby. Rob chases Marcus after he thinks he slept with his daughter.
Everyone hugs after their confessions and they go to the 4th of July picnic. The kids are playing in the water and Eric tries to waterski but breaks the engine.
During the rematch basketball game. The guys walk up in slow motion and their wives cheerlead.
Playing after the basketball game during the fireworks. Marcus shoots an arrow in the air again.
First song in the end credits.
2nd song in the end credits.
3rd song in the end credits.

movie_related.name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

songs.scene_description: The Begininng, the camera fades in on the dead body of Mattie's father as she narrates.
Mattie walks to the house of the Boarding House Landlady and is showed her fathers found possessions.
Mattie walks out of the boarding house after speaking with LaBoeuf, reading a letter, she then walks into Stonehill's.
Mattie walks into the barn after speaking with Stonehill, she finds a black horse and names him Little Blackie, she then continues to ride him around and away.

Mattie prepares for the adventure ahead, she puts on a duster coat and a hat, packs a gun and a few apples while narrating a letter sent to her mum. we then see her mount Little Blackie and ride out of the barn.
Mattie finds Rooster and LaBoeuf on the opposite side of the river then continues to cross the river on her horse.
After LaBoeuf and Rooster argue, LaBoeuf says "Adios" then rides away, Mattie asks " We don't need him do we marshall?" the scene then fades into them approaching a house.

song.name: We Don't Need Him Do We?

songs.scene_description: Cogburn and Mattie are riding while he tell her stories about his last wife, they then find a man hanging from a tree, while Mattie is up the tree a mysterious man comes along but it turns out the man just wanted the body.

Mattie and Cogburn find a hut at night. Mattie covers the chimney, Cogburn takes the people hostage, Quincy fatally stabs Moon and Cogburn kills Quincy. The song ends in Rooster being told Ned and his gang will be at the hut soon.

song.name: A Methodist and a Son of a Bitch

songs.scene_description: Cogburn and Mattie wait by the hut. A suspected scout turns up which turns out to be LaBoeuf, Ned's Gang turn up and the scene dissolved into a firefight.
Mattie talks to Little Blackie outside the hut about Tom Chaney.
LaBoeuf and a drunken Cogburn fall out, LaBoeuf leaves on his horse after saying goodbye to Mattie who then falls asleep.
Mattie goes down to the river for a bucket of water, where she finds Chaney. She is then Taken Hostage by him and Neds gang.
The gunfight starts between Cogburn and Ned's gang.
Mattie shoots Chaney. The recoil causes her to fall back down a pit where she gets stuck and finds a dead body with multiple snakes inside of it.
Cogburn attempts to ride the poisioned Mattie home on Little Blackie, after miles she eventually tires, succumbs and is shot by Rooster.
idk wh
Mattie is older, she narrates the scene as we see her go to visit Rooster at his running show.

Wonder why the hymn "
God Has Been My Refuge Daily" isn't credited, it plays after Rooster says he'll meet her in the morning, after she discovers he left & she pursues him, and as her horse swims the river, again while Rooster cuts her hand after the snakebite and as he sets her on ground after shooting horse, http://www.bethelpbc.com/Audio/Singing/God%20Has%20Been%20My%20Refuge%20short.mp3 also see https://www.google.com/search?q=God+has+been+my+refuge+daily&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8#q=%22God+has+been+my+refuge+daily%22

songs.scene_description: First song during opening credits. Dave wakes up and rides the bus to school.
Dave gets the transmitter/radio device working. This song starts playing.
Song as Dave listens to Becky\'s channel on the radio as he watches over the Tesla lab.
First song when Dave and Becky watch the electricity Tesla coil.
Dave uses his power and mop and clean the room.
Dave leaves Balthazar after a fight and sees Becky at the coffee shop. She follows him to the rooftop.
The young girl makes a request at Becky's radio show.
Song when Dave calls Bennet, he is with a girl and tells him its a bad time.
Second song during end credits.

songs.scene_description: credits scene
First song as Peter (Robert Downey Jr.) is talking on the phone about baby names.
Ethan test smoking weed with the dealer at her house.
Ethan and Peter drive off again after getting weed off the dealers. This song plays in the car.
Song playing in the car as Ethan is falling asleep while driving.
Peter and Daryl (Jamie Foxx) drive off with Ethan in the back of the pick-up truck.
Plays in the car after they leave Darryl's house after they accidentally drink Ethan's fathers' ashes.
Ethan smokes weed from his bong while driving. Peter wakes up and realizes he and the dog are stoned.
After Ethan rescues Peter from the Mexican border patrol officers by driving his trailer onto the freeway. Peter tells Ethan that he loves him and calls him wife.
Song as Ethan spreads his dad\'s ashes at the grand canyon.
They drive to the hospital after Ethan shoots Peter in the leg. This song plays in the car.
First song. Opening credits. Reed (Ashton Kutcher) lies in bed with Morley (Jessica Alba)
Song after Reed proposes to Morley.
Playing at the flower market as the flowers are being unloaded off the truck.

Alex gets dropped off at graces house and prepares for her arrival.
Playing in graces car when Alex stops her in the street.
Sean Jackson is driving with this song playing on the radio before running into the flower van.
After he drives off again in the flower van and all the flowers fall out of the back.

songs.scene_description: Reed (Kutcher) takes the hybrid Chevy to the LAX airport to try to catch Julia before she leaves.
Song after Julia confronts Harrison at the restaurant. Kara (Jessica Beil) arrives at the restaurant for her hating valentines party.
During the Indian wedding. Julia (Jennifer Garner) beats up the love heart pinnate.

Alex and Grace kiss on the car. Felicia (Taylor Swift) and Willy (Lautner) kiss as they get out of the elevator.
Montage towards end of movie. All the couples seen doing things together. We find out Holden (Bradley Cooper) is gay with Sean Jackson.
First song in end credits. During out-takes.
2nd song in end credits.

movie_related.name: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason

songs.scene_description: First song as Mark sits in the bar with his girlfriend, Erica talking about school clubs.
Opening credits as mark runs through the Harvard college grounds after the break up.
After Erica breaks up with Mark and he blogs about her on LiveJournal. Plays briefly as background music from another dorm room.
Mark hacks into the various schools after his breakup and starts developing his new website, 'FaceMash' by stealing student display pics. He blogs simultaneously.
FaceMash goes lives and floods the Harvard servers causing it to crash.
Mark reads the note and leaves class. Mark meets the Winklevii.
Song playing at the Carribbean house party at the frat house.
Eduardo and Mark talk outside the Caribbean house party.
Lawyer reads the emails. Mark begin creating Facebook. Eduardo pass the Phoenix challenges.
Mark adds the relation status after talking with Dusting. FB begins. Mark prays.
Narendra sees FB and go warning the twins.
After The Facebook launches. The Capella is singing this at a school presentation.
Lawyer asks Mark why he didn't ask for money to the twins. Mark answer Eduardo was his friend. "Tell me more" scene.
Plays very briefly when a group of students talk to Mark and Eduardo about the presentation.
Sex at the rest rooms.
Eduardo and Mark go to see ad-man (Sorkin).
During the dinner where Mark first meets Sean Parker. Eduardo describes the situation to the lawyers and says Mark was very impressed by him.
Playing in another dorm room as Mark asks Eduardo for more money to rent a house in California. Eduardo warns Mark about Sean.
Plays briefly after the internet hacking initiation for the interns.
Mark and his friends are zip lining into the pool from the roof before the chimney breaks. Sean (Justin Timberlake) knocks on the front door.
Song in the club as Mark and Sean are talking about the website.
During the rowing competition race.

song.name: In the Hall of the Mountain King

songs.scene_description: After the rowing race. The twins find out facebook has expanded.

song.name: Arrival Of The Queen Of Sheba

songs.scene_description: Playing at Mark's house as the girls are playing video games. Eduardo arrives at the door and Sean lets him in.
Eduardo cancel account.
Mark telephones Eduardo. Scarf on fire!
Mark tells Eduardo to come back to Palo Alto for millionth member party.
Mark Zuckerberg is in the car with Sean Parker before he runs into the building to spite Case Investments.
Playing in the facebook offices as Eduardo realizes his shares have been liquified according to the contract.
Plays at the house party at the end of the movie after facebook reaches one million users.
Parker phones Marks after arrest.
Final shot, in which Mark sends his ex a friend request and refreshes the page every few seconds in anticipation of her response.
